Title: Not Enough Minerals
Description:
I did nae think the Opalcreg would be under attack! I'm sure Brinthe did nae either.

Peacekeeper Hektare will nae let me fight, but maybe she will let you.

I'll stay here an' tend to this earthen. I know a trick or two after bein' in Dornogal.

Oh, but... Brinthe really needed those opals...
ObjectivesText: Collect 6 Earthen Fire Opals from the Opalcreg in the Isle of Dorn.
CompletionText: I'm sure I can make a poultice for this earthen. Oh, 'tis a shame I cannae get any opals.
RewardText:
Fire Opals? You found some?

Brinthe'll be so pleased!

This earthen seems to be feeling better as well. A win-win all around!
